exceptions.exn: In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l Unable to unify "RInt f ?M2370 a = zero" with "l = zero".

In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l X : ?G H : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> RInt f a b = l Unable to unify "RInt f ?M2650 ?M2651 = RInt (fun _ : R => zero) ?M2650 ?M2651" with "l = zero".
The reference Hx was not found in the current environment.

In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing H1 : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> RInt f a b = RInt g a b a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l X : ?G H : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> RInt f a b = l X0 : ?G0 Unable to unify "zero" with "l".

In environment V : CompleteNormedModule R_AbsRing H1 : forall (f g : R -> V) (a b : R), (forall x : R, Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b -> f x = g x) -> RInt f a b = RInt g a b a : R f : R -> V l : V Hl : is_RInt f a a l X : ?G H : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> RInt f a b = l X0 : ?G0 Unable to unify "is_RInt f a a l" with "l = zero".

original: unfold RInt. apply iota_unique. intros l Hl. apply is_RInt_unique with (f:=f) (b:=a) (l:=zero). apply (RInt_ext f (fun _=> zero)). intros x Hx. rewrite Hx. reflexivity. apply Hl.
